channel.title: How do i fix my comp. It zoomed in
channel.description: I went on my comp and for some reason its really zoomed in. I cant figure out how to zoom it back out :( [img]http://i614.photobucket.com/albums/tt230/bmaw/Untitled-12.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do i fix my comp. It zoomed in
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:5, topic:287731”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=380399.msg2859902#msg2859902 date=1247097203]
Or you can simply Hold CTRL and then use the scroll thingy in between the Mouse Clicks and scroll back out
[/quote]
That’s mainly for text, not resolution.[/quote]It’s used to zoom in on a mac.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i fix my comp. It zoomed in

item.title: How do i fix my comp. It zoomed in
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You need to change the resolution.k
You can do this by left clicking your desktop and selecting Properties.
Then hopefully on Vista a pop-up should appear and you should find a Settings tab.
Then on the bar under “Screen Resolution” scroll it to the highest setting. Normally 1280x1024 but most people leave it at 1024x786.
Finally click ok or apply.

Read full topic
